<strong>Oi!</strong> Eu sou o <strong>En: Hi! I am Enzo, a Brazilian web developer in love with turning problems and challenges into codes, creating solutions that improve people's lives, making the everyday more simple and fun.
Desde pequeno, <strong>sempre gostei de: Since I'm young, I always liked to create things. Using cardboard, paper, drawings and recording, imagination and creativity have always been my friends. Over time, I developed a fascination with the audiovisual world, leading me to explore a variety of applications related to creation and editing of photos and videos. Although I still like photo and video content production, in recently I have attracted myself more to software development.
No começo, criava joguinhos usando Offic: In the beginning, I created games using Office and VBA. Then, in 2019, I advanced to C because of a course offered in my city by a great teacher of mine. Outraged by being limited by the black screen of the console, I started studying JavaScript, HTML and CSS on my own during the quarantine. This is how I could finally create online websites and tools, browser extensions and Telegram and Discord bots.
Tenho o desejo de explorar a criação de: I have the desire to explore the creation of more complex games and applications, focused on mobile devices and computers. However, this journey has been a challenge, as the school and college entrance exams consume much of my time to teach me the process of rock formation, functions of a cell membrane or the periodic table.
Quando não estou programando, estou conv: When I'm not programming, I'm talking to friends, playing videogames, watching movies or series, or, unfortunately, studying for college entrance exams.
Um dicionário da língua portuguesa brasi: A dictionary of the Brazilian Portuguese language on Telegram

Com esta ferramenta, você pode criar men: With this tool, you can create messages that flash to get people's attention in real life.
Este projeto usa tags NFC para identific: This project uses NFC tags to identify my school materials. If I lose something, it allows contact for recovery.
